data.text: The year started off so well. https://t.co/NuqoVfByt4
Ricky’s monologue at this year's Golden Globes has been viewed an estimated 300 million times around the world on TV and social media. https://t.co/XduCtEHkph
Thanks for all your tweets about #AfterLife, particularly your opinions on the themes and characters. It's really helped while I've been writing series 3. Keep 'em coming 🙏 https://t.co/0HBxWuP2Ox

Congratulations to our Best British Comedy (drama): #Afterlife2 from @rickygervais @netflixuk 

The Version Honours List 2020 revealed https://t.co/oe12k3mIQB via @theversion

NEW: Comedy legend @rickygervais has announced he's playing a SuperNature warm-up show at @O2ForumKTown on Tuesday 15th December 🙌

Grab tickets from 10am tomorrow 👉 https://t.co/HJ9ljSY14e https://t.co/X5seCgSeH8
Tired, dim or drunk? https://t.co/6vtNPICk0c

YES! How lucky are we?! The one & only @rickygervais will be back warming up his newest live show #SuperNature here at #O2ForumKentishTown (socially distanced, of course) on Tuesday 15 December 2020!  

TIckets on sale 10am this Friday 04 December at @TicketmasterUK #rickygervais https://t.co/C672cXq052

We're delighted to announce your Favourite On Demand Show of 2020 is: AFTER LIFE 😊 @rickygervais @NetflixUK

Charities in financail crisis due to loss of donations none more so than those with animals in their care.   Pls remember them at Xmas such as those Ricky Gervais is Patron of @galgos_GIN @AllDogsMatter @AnimalsAsia @Nowzad @Paws2RescueUK @themayhew @wildlifeaid https://t.co/3EtS0WWOl6

"When I was growing up, I didn't know a grown man who would say, 'I'm depressed,'" said @rickygervais. "I wonder how many times we saw working-class men, you know, labourers like my dad, just get drunk and go to bed.… So it's still a complex issue." https://t.co/P1SAtgoFEZ
